title: These 5 Popular ’80s Songs Are Still Cringe-Worthy Decades Later
description: Nothing transports you back to neon lights and shoulder pads like the tunes of the 1980s, but some of those songs make us cringe now...
author: Amanda Blankenship
excerpt: Some ’80s hits are iconic—and cringe-worthy. Discover five songs from the ’80s that sound dated, cheesy, or awkward decades later.
